Please provide all assets below:

Asset Dimensions File size Max file size (polite load)* File type
Skin 2500x1316 400kb 400kb JPG
Halfpage 300x1050 250kb 500kb JPG, HTML5 zip or third-party tag
Leaderboard 1260x250 350kb 700kb JPG, HTML5 zip or third-party tag

Template Notes: To make the file smaller you can just have empty space where the site would go over the top of the image.

Please provide all assets below:

Asset Dimensions File size Max file size (polite load)* File type
Skin 2500x1316 400kb 400kb JPG
Halfpage 300x1050 250kb 500kb JPG, HTML5 or third-party tag
Leaderboard 1260x250 350kb 700kb JPG, HTML5 or third-party tag
Video 412x230
(16:9)		 800kb 800kb MP4
  • No sound
  • Video will autoplay and loop

Template Notes: To make the file smaller you can just have empty space where the site would go over the top of the image.

The aim of the video is to have a short, eye-catching loop of game content that autoplays when the ad loads. We suggest keeping it under 10 seconds to keep the file size down.

The video element can be placed anywhere in the 1260x250 leaderboard area but please send a mock-up of where it needs to be.

The video can have the same link as the rest of the leaderboard or if you want to open a Youtube video (a full trailer for example) then you can provide a Youtube video ID and this will be opened in an overlay on the site when a user clicks the autoplay video.
